Bink SDK 1.7b

S32

The basic type S32 describes a signed 32-bit integer.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: BinkBufferCheckWinPos, BinkBufferLock, BinkBufferSetOffset, BinkBufferSetScale, BinkBufferUnlock, BinkCheckCursor, BinkCopyToBuffer, BinkCopyToBufferRect, BinkDoFrame, BinkGetRects, BinkIsSoftwareCursor, BinkPause, BinkRestoreCursor, BinkSetPan, BinkSetSoundOnOff, BinkSetSoundSystem, BinkSetVideoOnOff, BinkSetVolume, BinkSoundUseAX, BinkSoundUseDirectSound, BinkSoundUseMiles, BinkSoundUseMusyX, BinkSoundUseRAD_IOP, BinkSoundUseSDLMixer, BinkSoundUseSoundManager, BinkWait, RAD_IOPCancelAllAsyncs, RAD_IOPCancelAsyncOpen, RAD_IOPCancelAsyncRead, RAD_IOPCancelFileAsyncs, RAD_IOPCancelGroupOfAsyncs, RAD_IOPCloseFile, RAD_IOPGetIOStatus, RAD_IOPHardwareVolumes, RAD_IOPPauseSound, RAD_IOPPauseTimer, RAD_IOPQueueAsyncOpenFile, RAD_IOPQueueAsyncReadAtBottom, RAD_IOPQueueAsyncReadAtTop, RAD_IOPRegisterSoundCallback, RAD_IOPRegisterTimerCallback, RAD_IOPShutDown, RAD_IOPStartSound, RAD_IOPStartUp, RAD_IOPUnregisterSoundCallback, RAD_IOPUnregisterTimerCallback
